articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects New Dental Sanitary Goods Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Newly-built Dental Sanitary Goods Factory
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un provided field guidance to the newly-built Dental Sanitary Goods Factory.
					 The factory was newly built as Kim Jong Un personally initiated and solved all issues arising in construction. The factory, with a total floor space of more than 12 720 square meters, produces tens of millions of toothpastes, gargles and dental sanitary implements.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the factory, Kim Jong Un said that another stylish factory was built and it looked good and smart as its outer walls were tiled with white and green color suitable for the appearance of the sanitary goods producer.
					
					 After being briefed on the factory in front of maps showing its production diagram and panoramic view, he went round a combined production control room, toothpaste production process, gargle production process, dental sanitary goods production process, analysis room and various other places of the factory to learn in detail about construction and production there.
					
					 Saying that the factory is the one greatly conducive to promoting the people's health and the one to which he is attaching great importance, he gave an instruction which would serve as the guidelines in management and operation of the factory.
					
					 Noting that the new factory had his wish realized to give varieties of good-quality dental sanitary goods to our people, he said with pleasure that he was very glad to do another worthwhile work for the people's long life in good health.
					
					 He said that the factory should keep production going at a high rate, provide the people with good-quality dental sanitary goods without running out of stock and thus make the people get benefit, adding that he would solve all issues arising in production. He stressed the need to present a report to him on the knotty issues in good time.
					
					 The Party has directed big efforts to the work for consolidating the material and technical foundation of the public health sector in order to give full play to the advantages of the socialist healthcare system of our country without an equal in the world in which the Party and the state are taking care of the life and health of the people in a responsible manner, he said, underscoring the need for our people to fully enjoy the happy life, keenly feeling the benefits of the socialist healthcare system.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the officials and employees of the factory would devote their unsparing efforts, passion and wisdom to the drive for making contribution to promoting the people's health.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, So Hong Chan, Jo Yong Won and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Sports Games of Orphans Close
articles.content:
Sports Games of Orphans Close
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Sports games of students from middle schools for orphans across the country was closed with due ceremony at Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School on Tuesday.
					 Students from middle schools in provinces competed in various events including football, basketball and volleyball of the games, which began on June 13.
					
					 Coming first in total standings was the Pyongyang City team.

articles.title: April 15 Literary Production Company Marks 50th Birthday
articles.content:
April 15 Literary Production Company Marks 50th Birthday
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The April 15 Literary Production Company marked its 50th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung bestowed precious and abundant ideological and moral assets on writers and read every work written by them before praising them to the skies and reposing deep trust in them.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il founded the April 15 Literary Production Company on June 20, Juche 56 (1967) and had wisely guided it, clearly showing the orientation and ways for creation.
					
					 The company has contributed to speeding up the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism while conveying the revolutionary history and exploits of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to posterity for the past 50 years.
					
					 A meeting was held on Tuesday to mark the anniversary.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and writers, officials and employees of the company.

articles.title: Songchongang and Hyesan Bag Factories Go Operational
articles.content:
Songchongang and Hyesan Bag Factories Go Operational
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Bag factories were newly completed in Hamhung and Hyesan cities.
					 The factories can produce much more school bags and high-quality and smart bags for children and people.
					
					 The inaugural ceremonies took place at the relevant units.

articles.title: South Hamgyong Provincial Revolutionary Museum Opens
articles.content:
South Hamgyong Provincial Revolutionary Museum Opens
 Hamhung, June 20 (KCNA) -- The South Hamgyong Provincial Revolutionary Museum was opened.
					 The opening ceremony took place.
					
					 It was attended by officials in the province, employees of the museum, builders and working people.
					
					 Kim Song Il, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made an inaugural speech.

articles.title: Folk Song "Arirang", Precious Musical Heritage of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Folk Song "Arirang", Precious Musical Heritage of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Song "Arirang" is a precious musical heritage of the entire nation, not limited to a certain area or period throughout the whole historical course of the Korea nation.
					 Therefore, it has been well known over the world as the one representative of the Korean folk songs and symbolic of the Korean nation from long ago.
					
					 The song is run through with anguish at parting, bitter feeling of poor life and aspiration for happy life.
					
					 And there have existed in Korea a number of its local varieties like Sodo Arirang, Arirang of Hamgyong Province, Arirang of Kangwon Province, Milyang Arirang and Yongchon Arirang.
					
					 Today, many art works related with "Arirang" have been created in praise of the Songun (military-first) era and the prosperous DPRK. Among them is the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" which was registered in the Guinness Book of World Records in August Juche 96 (2007).

articles.title: Kangso Mineral Water Factory
articles.content:
Kangso Mineral Water Factory
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kangso mineral water has become well-known from hundreds of years ago for containing good ingredients.
					 There exists in Kangso District, Nampho City a factory to process the mineral water. The factory has over 40 years-long history and comes to be a leading mineral water producer to be proud of in the world for its output and quality.
					
					 According to Rim Son Hwa, manager of the factory, the mineral water goes through a process of separating carbonic acid gas from water, several filters, ultraviolet disinfector and the process of blowing the gas into water.
					
					 By introducing a new technology in gas-separation process, the factory has increased its output of carbonic acid gas and improved the quality of mineral water, she said, adding:
					
					 The production of mineral water is monitored and controlled in real-time by the integrated production system, while the sanitary safety and quality of goods are ensured by the quality control system.
					
					 When visiting the factory in June, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said that to keep production going at a high rate at the factory is an important work for demonstrating the advantages of the socialist system of the DPRK under which all assets of the society are used for the promotion of people's wellbeing.

articles.title: Circular Pendant Lamp Produced
articles.content:
Circular Pendant Lamp Produced
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been channeled into home-production of finishing building materials in the DPRK.
					 The Pyongyang Lighting Appliances Factory has recently produced various circular pendant lamps with fine electric and optical parameters.
					
					 In this regard, Kim In Hyok, vice chief-engineer of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 The circular pendant lamps produced by the factory have been applied to the Pyongyang Mechanical Pencil Factory, the Central Mushroom Research Institute and public buildings and dwelling houses.
					
					 Those lamps are brighter than ordinary LED lamps and effective in decorating the ceiling.
					
					 And their acrylic resin globes are colorfast and longer than resin ones in serviceable life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Aloft Banner of By Korean Nation Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Aloft Banner of By Korean Nation Itself
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article that all the fellow countrymen are unanimously calling upon the present south Korean authorities to make a bold decision for mending the north-south relations and come out for implementing it.
					 It is necessary to adhere to the principle of national independence clarified in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in order to improve the north-south ties and open the road of peace and reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 No outsider does want to see the Korean nation getting reunified and growing powerful.
					
					 Foreign forces are trying to catch fish in troubled waters from the confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 Even though half a century has passed, the Korean nation is still locked in confrontation, failing to put an end to its tragic division, due to the outsiders' interference and disturbance.
					
					 The improvement of the north-south relations and national reunification can never be attained when one goes for cooperation with the outsiders persistently and viciously checking the reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 However, the present south Korean authorities are revealing their unreasonable stand of depending on foreign forces and following them just like their predecessors, oblivious of the lesson of history, thereby making the prospect of the north-south ties all the more gloomy.
					
					 If they sincerely respect the mind-set of the candlelight demonstrators and have a will to choose the improvement of the north-south relations, they should stop their act of following and kowtowing to the U.S., of selling the national dignity and interests and of escalating mistrust and hostility between fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make a proper decision at the crossroads of independence or sycophancy and by the Korean nation itself or "alliance" with the U.S.
					
					 The prospect of the north-south relations and settlement of the reunification issue depends on the south Korean authorities' choice.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. for Pressuring S. Korean Authorities to Allow Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. for Pressuring S. Korean Authorities to Allow Deployment of THAAD
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The parliamentary undersecretary of the U.S. Department of State recently visited south Korea, where he expressed displeasure with the measure of reexamining the environmental influence on the area where THAAD are to be displayed, saying the foundation of the alliance may shake, and called for pressing ahead with the plan to deploy THAAD as soon as possible.
					 Earlier, the acting assistant secretary in charge of                  disarmament verification of the U.S. State Department held a meeting with the south Korean authorities at which he pressed for the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 In addition to the Department of State, the Department of Defense and the Congress and media of the U.S. and even Trump are coming out to threaten and blackmail the south Korean authorities to allow the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 This is nothing but a sinister intention to hold strategic hegemony in Asia-Pacific and turn the Korean peninsula into a nuclear war theatre. It means an intolerable insult to the south Korean people opposed to the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 The U.S. is justifying the THAAD deployment, describing it as a measure to cope with "nuclear and missile threat from the north", but it is little short of impudent sophism to cover up its true colors as a burglar.
					
					 The present situation clearly shows that the U.S. is the arch enemy of the Korean nation as it makes no scruple of bringing the whole of the Korean peninsula into a nuclear disaster and sacrificing the south Korean people to it.
					
					 What is more intolerable is the attitude of the south Korean authorities as they are behaving foolishly under the pressure of the U.S.
					
					 If they continue to repeat such disgraceful history, stuck in the mire of flunkeyism and submission, they would meet the same fate as the Park Geun Hye group cursed by the candlelight demonstrators.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Should Not Kowtow to U.S.: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Should Not Kowtow to U.S.: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is going utterly reckless over the deployment of THAAD in south Korea recently.
					 The U.S. Department of State, Department of Defense, Congress and media and even President Trump have joined the campaign for pressurizing the south Korean regime, expressing discontent about the its projected reexamination of THAAD's impact on the environment.
					
					 Shortly ago, Trump called the secretaries of State and Defense and other diplomacy and  security controllers to the White House and underlined the importance to deploy THAAD, despite his awkward position of being driven to impeachment.
					
					 Meanwhile, he let officials of his administration appear in media to "express the stand" on the deployment of THAAD. And he dispatched high-ranking officials one after another to south Korea to pressurize the south Korean regime. They intimidated the regime, saying south Korea-U.S. alliance might be broken due to the postponement of THAAD deployment and urging it to press ahead with the earlier deployment of THAAD. 
					
					 This is just a manifestation of the brigandish nature of the U.S. deeming south Korea as its colony, and an intolerable insult and threat to the south Korean people opposed to the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 THAAD is not for protecting south Korea from "north's threat" but for carrying out the U.S. policy of aggression to turn south Korea into the outpost of its missile defense system for carrying out its strategy for dominating the world.
					
					 The first deputy director of the General Operation Bureau of the General Staff of the Russian Forces said the U.S. decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea is to secure an military edge over Russia and China.
					
					 People of various circles in south Korea and the international community are terming it a U.S. "intention to deploy its global defense system on the Korean peninsula under the pretext of north Korea's nukes and missiles", asserting it will only spark "an arms race and a terrible disaster."
					
					 But the U.S. has gone so impudent as to press the south Korean regime, asserting the THAAD deployment is important "not only for the U.S. forces but also for protecting an ally" and "the deployment should not be withdrawn as it is a decision common to allies."
					
					 This is just a manifestation of the Yankee-style arrogance that south Korea should be sacrificed for the interests of the U.S. and south Korea is obliged to introduce anything although it is worse than THAAD.
					
					 South Korea has turned into a primary target of the neighboring nuclear powers and south Koreans are suffering double and treble economic loss, distressed with mental and psychological pain, due to the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the south Korean authorities, which surrendered to the U.S. open threats and blackmails, are clumsily behaving, confirming that there would be no fundamental change in the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 By origin, the deployment of THAAD is one of the most serious evils left by the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea and its withdrawal serves as a touchstone discerning as to whether the present regime of south Korea truly speaks for the candlelight demonstrators or a lackey of the U.S. like Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The only way out for south Korea to escape from pressure and distress caused by THAAD is to accept the advice of the compatriots in the north and the public demand absolutely.
					
					 The south Korean regime should bear in mind that it would only follow in the footsteps of the predecessors if it persists in sycophancy toward the U.S.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Pro-U.S. Burlesque Insulting Nation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Pro-U.S. Burlesque Insulting Nation 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The farce for "commemorating" 100 years since the foundation of the 2nd Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea staged by the puppet forces recently has faced strong protest and denunciation by south Koreans from all walks of life.
					 A recent concert that marked the beginning of the "commemoration" on June 10 ended in smoke due to the strong opposition by residents and rejection by performers.
					
					 The curse and indignation at the despicable pro-U.S. group of south Korea is mounting as the commemoration is staged just a few days before the 15th years since the murder of two south Korean schoolgirls by GIs of the U.S. 2nd Division.
					
					 This is due rejection by the public at the sycophantic traitors prolonging their days with pro-Americanism while serving the U.S. imperialists that inflicted unspeakable misfortune and pain on the Korean nation for decades.
					
					 For the past seven decades the U.S. forces in south Korea have committed crimes of all descriptions including murder, plunder, thief and rape while exercising the extraterritorial rights on the plea of the shackling "Status of Forces Agreement".
					
					 Five crimes are committed on a daily average by the U.S. forces whose number has reached hundreds of thousands when counting those known to the world.
					
					 The 2nd Division entered this land before others during the Korean War, and is a group of devils which committed shuddering crimes after coiling up in Uijongbu, Kyonggi Province for more than half a century.
					
					 A typical example is the hideous crimes shocking the world such as Uijongbu multiple rape case, a case of cutting hair of a woman in Tongduchon and a case of murdering Yun Kum I.
					
					 The division has played a key role in bio-chemical warfare aimed to devastate 3,000-ri land by introducing into south Korea anthrax, pest and Zika virus whose use is banned by international law.
					
					 Innocent souls do not rest in peace by the U.S. imperialist ogres in different parts of south Korea, and shuddering in agony are mountains, streams, trees and plants on this land contaminated by all kinds of poisonous wastes from U.S. military bases.
					
					 The puppet forces holding "celebration performances" for the hideous military murderous hooligans and squandering huge money collected from people as taxes are a group of traitors to the nation steeped in submission and sycophancy to the U.S. to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 It is quite natural that the "commemoration" is rejected as a senseless act of pro-U.S. traitors who have not even an iota of blood and soul as members of the nation.
					
					 However, the pro-U.S. conservatives including those of the puppet Uijongbu city allegedly supervising the "commemoration" are pressing for it.
					
					 The group of traitors serving the U.S. must clearly understand that the pro-U.S. burlesque of "eulogizing" aggressors and ogres are giving a vent to the nation's anti-American feelings.
					
					 There will be fiercer and just struggle of the south Koreans to end the history of disgrace and distress and retake the nation's dignity and sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party Building Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party Building Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Figures
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of Bangladeshi political parties took place on June 10 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venue of the seminar were photos showing exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also displayed were photos introducing successes achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in building a socialist power.
					
					 Speakers including the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and the president of the Bangladesh People's League said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK marked a historic event of epochal significance in developing the WPK into a party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il the WPK has developed into the party in which the leadership system of the leader has been thoroughly established, the mother party serving the people after forming a harmonious whole with them and the militant party with strong sense of organization and discipline.
					
					 Korea, once a weak nation under imperialist colonial rule in the past, is now demonstrating its dignity as a political and military power, a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state. This would be unthinkable without the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They expressed their conviction that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in implementing the tasks advanced at the Seventh Congress of the WPK despite all challenges under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nepalese Figure Denounces Moves of U.S. and Its Vassal Forces to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
Nepalese Figure Denounces Moves of U.S. and Its Vassal Forces to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, contributed an article to the Nepalese paper Arpan on June 9 to denounce the shameless moves of the hostile forces including the U.S. for sanctions and pressure against the DPRK.
					 Noting that the U.S. again cooked up "sanctions resolution" by instigating the UNSC, he went on:
					
					 The sanctions against the DPRK serve as act harming its sovereignty.
					
					 The world condemns the UN for cooking up the "sanctions resolution" while dancing to the tune of the U.S.
					
					 The whole world is stunned by the Trump administration increasing the hostile policy towards the DPRK by wooing the UN, not content with posing military threat to it by shipping nuclear strategic assets to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. cooked up the "sanctions resolution" by labeling the public opinion on the DPRK's rocket test launch for self-defence as "threat against the global peace", but the DPRK will never yield to it.
					
					 The rocket test launches of the DPRK serve as a demonstration of its will not to step back even an inch in confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The sanctions of the U.S. and its vassal forces against the DPRK embolden it to bolster up its self-defensive nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition opened with due ceremony at Ulan Bator on June 13 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were hundreds of Kimjongilias, works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, books and magazines introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK was an epoch-making event in developing the WPK.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a party in which its leader's ideology and guidance system was firmly established, a motherly party serving the people and a revolutionary party with strong sense of organization and discipline.
					
					 The chairman of the Mongolian-Korean Parliamentary Group of the State Great Hural of Mongolia wished the friendly and cooperative relations between Mongolia and the DPRK would grow stronger with Kimjongilia in full bloom.
					
					 The participants enjoyed a performance given by Mongolian artistes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica de Articulos de Higiene Dental
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica de Articulos de Higiene Dental
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno la nueva Fabrica de Articulos de Higiene Dental.
					El tomo la iniciativa de construirla y soluciono uno por otro los problemas que se presentaban en su edificacion. 
					
					La planta con mas de 12 mil 720 metros cuadrados de superficie arquitectonica total es una gran base capaz de producir anualmente decenas de millones de pastas dentales, agua salada y otros utensilios de higiene dental. 
					
					Contemplando el panorama de la fabrica, el Maximo Dirigente dijo que se ha construido otra fabrica elegante y es vistosa su pared exterior decorada con azulejos de colores blanco y verde conforme al aspecto de base productora de articulos de higiene.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de procesos de produccion y el otro panoramico, recorrio varios puntos tales como la sala de mando de produccion integral, los procesos de produccion de pasta dental, agua salada y otros articulos de higiene dental y la sala de analisis averiguando detalladamente el estado de construccion y produccion.
					
					Senalando que el concede mucha importancia a esta planta que va a contribuir mucho al fomento de salud publica, dio las instrucciones a ser tomadas como guia en la administracion y operacion de ella.
					
					Gracias a la construccion de esta nueva y moderna fabrica, se hizo posible cumplir el deseo de entregar a nuestro pueblo los cualitativos articulos de higiene dental de diversos tipos, recalco. Y se mostro muy contento por haber cumplido otra tarea valiosa para la salud y longevidad del pueblo.
					
					La fabrica debe normalizar en el nivel elevado la produccion y suministrar sin interrupcion los articulos de buena calidad a los habitantes para que estos se beneficien mucho de ellos, apunto. Encomendo que le informara si ocurre algun problema prometiendo resolver todos los problemas que se presentan en la produccion.
					
					Apunto que para poner en pleno juego la superioridad del regimen de salud publica socialista de nuestro pais, el unico del mundo donde el partido y el Estado son totalmente responsables de la vida y salud de las personas, el partido sigue concediendo mucha atencion a las labores para consolidar la base material y tecnica de la rama de salud publica. Anadio que se debe hacer al pueblo vivir felizmente sintiendo en carne propia los beneficios del regimen de salud publica socialista.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la planta dedicaran toda su fuerza, pasion e inteligencia a la lucha por hacer aporte al fomento de salud publica.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, So Hong Chan, Jo Yong Won y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril conmemora 50o aniversario de fundacion
articles.content:
Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril conmemora 50o aniversario de fundacion
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril de Corea acogio el 50o aniversario de su fundacion.
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung deposito una gran confianza en los escritores del colectivo dandoles valiosas y ricas inspiraciones ideo-espirituales y evaluando todas las obras creadas por ellos.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il organizo el colectivo el 20 de junio del 56 (1967) de la Era Juche y lo dirigio minuciosamente aclarando la direccion y remedios de creacion.
					
					  Durante 50 anos pasados, ese colectivo de literatos vino contribuyendo a transmitir a las generaciones venideras la historia y hazanas revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y acelerar el cumplimiento de la causa de identificacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 20 el acto conmemorativo.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los escritores, los funcionarios directivos de creacion y los empleados de la entidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun acusa a EE.UU. de imponer al Sur de Corea el emplazamiento de THAAD
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun acusa a EE.UU. de imponer al Sur de Corea el emplazamiento de THAAD
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- En su reciente visita al Sur de Corea, el secretario adjunto del Departamento de Estado para asuntos politicos de Estados Unidos, se mostro descontento por la medida de reevaluar las influencias al medioambiente del solar de THAAD.
					Exigio "desplegar con anticipacion el THAAD" senalando que esa medida "puede sacudir la base de la alianza".
					
					Con anterioridad, viajo a Seul el sustituto del asistente del secretario de Estado para la verificacion de desarme de Estados Unidos quien sostuvo una reunion con las autoridades surcoreanas obligandoles a dar acicate al emplazamiento de THAAD.
					
					Ademas del Departamento de Estado, hacen otro tanto el Pentagono, el Congreso, los medios de prensa y hasta Trump.
					
					Con este tema, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 20 un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					El hecho mencionado significa un insulto intolerable a la poblacion surcoreana, que se opone al despliegue de THAAD, dejando conocer la siniestra intencion de EE.UU. de tomar la hegemonia estrategica en la region de Asia-Pacifico y convertir la Peninsula Coreana en un campo de guerra nuclear.
					
					La insistencia norteamericana en que THAAD es para hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea" no pasa de ser una sofisteria para justificar sus maniobras agresivas y encubrir su fachada de gangster.
					
					La situacion actual comprueba que EE.UU. es el enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana que para alcanzar su objetivo, no se vacila en imponer sobre toda la Peninsula Coreana los desastres nucleares y sacrificar el destino de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Lo mas indignante del caso es la actitud vacilante de las autoridades surcoreanas cohibidas ante la presion de EE.UU. Si ellas repiten la historia de humillacion sin apartarse del servilismo y sumision a grandes potencias, seran repudiadas por el pueblo levantado con velas, al igual que la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas deben prestar oidos a la demanda de sus habitantes, senala ACNC
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas deben prestar oidos a la demanda de sus habitantes, senala ACNC
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Estos dias, Estados Unidos se porta descaradamente por la ubicacion de "THAAD" en el suelo surcoreano.
					Los departamentos de Estado y Defensa, el Congreso, los medios de prensa y hasta Trump expresan abiertamente su disgusto a la realizacion de la reevaluacion de la influencia del medioambiente sobre el solar de "THAAD" e imponen mas la instalacion de ese sistema antimisil a las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Pese a que esta en la crisis de ser dimitido, Trump dijo en la Casa Blanca a los secretarios de Estado y Defensa y otros tipejos de la diplomacia y seguridad que el "THAAD es muy importante para el gobierno norteamericano".
					
					Por otra parte, hace que los personajes del gobierno publicaran la posicion relativa al emplazamiento de THAAD a los medios de prensa y envia con urgencia al Sur de Corea las personalidades de alto nivel presionando que "puede destruirse la alianza Sudcorea-EE.UU. debido al retraso de instalacion de THAAD" y "hay que impulsar la ubicacion pronta de THAAD".
					
					Este hecho es la expresion clara de la naturaleza bandidesca del pais norteamericano que considera el suelo surcoreano como su colonia y ademas deviene un intolerable insulto y chantaje a la poblacion surcoreana que se opone al despliegue de THAAD.
					
					La ubicacion de THAAD no se necesita para "defender" el suelo surcoreano desde la "amenaza del Norte", sino se practica segun la politica agresiva de EE.UU encaminada a convertir el territorio surcoreano en la base avanzada del sistema de defensa antimisil para la realizacion de su estrategia de dominio mundial.
					
					El primer subdirector de la Direccion Operacional General del Estado Mayor General de las fuerzas armadas de Rusia revelo que la decision de EE.UU. por el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea fue tomada en el objeto de ocupar la supremacia militar sobre Rusia y China.
					
					Diversos estratos surcoreanos y internacionales condenan que "EE.UU. trata de ubicar en la Peninsula Coreana el global sistema antimisil so pretexto de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte y que "el THAAD causara la carrera armamentista y traera la gran calamidad".
					
					Sin embargo, el pais estadounidense picotea cinicamente que este "trabajo tiene suma importancia para proteger no solo a las tropas yanquis, sino tambien a los paises aliados" y que "no debe ser abolido porque es la decision entre aliados".
					
					Debido al despliegue de THAAD, el suelo surcoreano se convirtio en primer blanco de golpe de las potencias nucleares perifericas y los habitantes surcoreanos sufren doble y triple perdidas economicas y el sufrimiento espiritual y psicologico.
					
					Pero, las autoridades surcoreanas, doblegadas ante la amenaza y chantaje de su patron norteamericano, se portan vilmente diciendo que "no habra cambios principales en cuanto a la ubicacion de THAAD".
					
					El problema en cuestion es uno de los gravisimos errores cometidos durante el mandato de la traidora Park Geun-hye. Por tanto, la retirada de THAAD sirve de la piedra de toque para juzgar a las actuales autoridades surcoreanas que son el representante de las opiniones publicas de la lucha con velas encendidas o sirvientes de EE.UU. como Park Geun-hye.
					
					El unico remedio para liberarse de la presion y molestia, es aceptar totalmente la advertencia del Norte y la exigencia de las opiniones publicas.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener bien presente que la sumision a EE.UU significa continuar los fracasos de sus predecesores.
